description: Authoring format for Macromedia MX application software.  FLA files typically include vector image data for use in animations, timelines to control animation playback, and audio; they may also include bitmapped video content.  FLA files may include or reference ActionScripts.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">fla</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Macromedia Flash FLA Project File Format
